6 class RandomException : public LibCryptoSecException
7 {
8 public:
9  enum ErrorCode
10  {
11  UNKNOWN,
12  NO_DATA_SEEDED,
13  NO_IMPLEMENTED_FUNCTION,
14  INTERNAL_ERROR,
15  };
16  RandomException(std::string where)
17  {
18  this->where = where;
19  this->errorCode = RandomException::UNKNOWN;
20  }
21  RandomException(RandomException::ErrorCode errorCode, std::string where)
22  {
23  this->where = where;
24  this->errorCode = errorCode;
25  }
26  virtual ~RandomException() throw () {}
27  virtual std::string getMessage() const
28  {
29  return (RandomException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode));
30  }
31  virtual std::string toString() const
32  {
33  std::string ret;
34  if (this->errorCode == RandomException::UNKNOWN)
35  {
36  ret = "RandomException. Called by: " + this->where + ".";
37  }
38  else
39  {
40  ret = "RandomException: " + RandomException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Called by: " + this->where + ".";
41  }
42  return ret;
43  }
44  virtual RandomException::ErrorCode getErrorCode()
45  {
46  return this->errorCode;
47  }
48  static std::string errorCode2Message(RandomException::ErrorCode errorCode)
49  {
50  std::string ret;
51  switch (errorCode)
52  {
53  case RandomException::UNKNOWN:
54  ret = "Unknown error";
55  break;
56  case RandomException::NO_DATA_SEEDED:
57  ret = "No data seeded";
58  break;
59  case RandomException::NO_IMPLEMENTED_FUNCTION:
60  ret = "Default random engine has not implemented this function";
61  break;
62  case RandomException::INTERNAL_ERROR:
63  ret = "Internal error";
64  break;
65 // case RandomException:::
66 // ret = "";
67 // break;
68  }
69  return ret;
70  }
71 
72 protected:

74 };
